brief_summary.textblock:
Serum samples will be corrected twice from the same youth subjects with one year interval.

      Seroincidence of pertussis will be estimated by the elevation of Ig-G-PT in paired sera from
      an identical individual.

      The relationship between the incidence and the demographic data or medical history of the
      subjects will be discussed.

clinical_study.brief_title: Seroepidemiological Study of Pertussis and Other Infectious Diseases

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Students of junior high school, high schools or college in Gifu prefecture

          -  Students who can have the second blood drawing one year later

          -  Students (and their parent when students are underage) whose written consent is
             obtainable.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  None

study_pop.textblock: Students of junior high school, high school or college

clinical_study.official_title: Seroepidemiological Study of Pertussis and Other Infectious Diseases

oversight_info.authority: Japan: Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare

primary_outcome.description: Seroincidence of pertussis estimated by the elevation of Ig-G-PT in paired sera(0day, 365day).

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.measure: Antibodies of varicella, mumps and rubella
Infection risk factors including family numbers, living space, with or without a cough patient in the surroundings, medical history and hospitalization

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
